content.question:
Figure 1. Activation of a cyclin-<math alttext="C D K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>CDK</mtext></math> complex

The regulation of a certain cyclin-<math alttext="C D K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>CDK</mtext></math> complex involves the activity of three enzymes (Figure 1), and the activation of this complex is required for cells to progress through the cell cycle.
Based on Figure 1, which of the following describes a cell in which cell cycle progression continues?

choices.label: A cell in which enzyme <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>1</mtext></math> is functional, and enzyme <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2</mtext></math> and enzyme <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> are nonfunctional

A cell in which enzyme <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is nonfunctional, and enzyme <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> and enzyme <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> are functional

A cell in which enzyme <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and enzyme <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> are functional, and enzyme <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> is nonfunctional

A cell in which enzyme <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and enzyme <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> are nonfunctional, and enzyme <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> is functional

content.answer: A cell in which enzyme <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>1</mtext></math> is functional, and enzyme <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2</mtext></math> and enzyme <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> are nonfunctional

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
